messages.subject: Video of me and Kirby, with transcript
messages.msgSnippet: This transcript wasn’t so easy to do! And I’ve added some links and illustrations.  You can read along with the YouTube video of me and Kirby being
messages.messageBody:
This transcript wasn’t so easy to do!
And I’ve added some links and illustrations. You can read along with the YouTube video of me and Kirby being interviewed in 2010.

http://sandradodd.com/classDismissed

At first, when the film Class Dismissed came out (which you can rent online, at a link you can get to from Youtube if you click through), the individual interviews were not available, and then for a few years you could buy or rent them.

I accidentally came across the upload of this one, to YouTube. Working with the automatically-generated subtitles (which are crazy, mostly), I edited and formatted it.

There may be errors or typos, and if you find any and let me know, I can fix them.

It seems sometimes I didn’t answer the question. Sometimes I didn’t. :-) I do go off on tangents.

When you have an hour to fall into a hole, though, this one might be an option. :-)

Sandra
